Sentencas: In the last decades, NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC composites have emerged as interesting anodic materials for low and intermediate-temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC) due to their high electrical conductivities and low activation energies.
Titulo: Solution combustion-based synthesis of NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites for low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: In this work, we report a simple and efficient Solution Combustion Synthesis (SCS) procedure for fabricating NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites with attractive physical properties for applications in lowtemperature SOFC.
Titulo: Solution combustion-based synthesis of NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites for low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: The nitrate-fuel combustion method using citric acid as organic fuel was chosen due to its relatively low cost and good efficiency.
Titulo: Solution combustion-based synthesis of NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites for low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Their potential electrical and mechanical performance for competitive SOFC anode technologies was assessed by characterizing disk -like compacted powders obtained by SCS.
Titulo: Solution combustion-based synthesis of NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites for low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Two structurally optimized NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC disks were considered for the study of these properties, which presented good porosity and compaction degree.
Titulo: Solution combustion-based synthesis of NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites for low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Vickers hardness tests show the good mechanical properties of both samples, achieving maximum hardness values of 4.7 - 6.7 [GPa] and validating the efficiency of the used compaction process.
Titulo: Solution combustion-based synthesis of NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites for low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity studies suggest an insulating-like behavior for both samples, evidenced by an increase in conductivity as the temperature increases.
Titulo: Solution combustion-based synthesis of NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites for low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Good conductivities and low activation energies about of 10 -2
Titulo: Solution combustion-based synthesis of NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites for low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: [eV] were estimated for a low-temperature operation regime (400 - 600 degrees C), respectively, representing a highly competitive performance concerning similar composites typically reported in the literature.
Titulo: Solution combustion-based synthesis of NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites for low-temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Results show the efficiency of our fabrication procedures to produce efficient and competitive NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC composites with projections for future large-scale manufacturing of lowtemperature SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Solution combustion-based synthesis of NiO-GDC and NiO-SDC nanocomposites for low-temperature SOFC
